// src/i18n.js
import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import translationUA from"./locales/ua/translation.json";import translationRU from"./locales/ru/translation.json";import translationEN from"./locales/en/translation.json";i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{ua:{translation:translationUA},ru:{translation:translationRU},en:{translation:translationEN}},lng:"ua",fallbackLng:"ua",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
